title: Swarna Mayuri Jhumkas: Emerald & Ruby-Accented Golden Domes
materials: Cultured Pearls (Mutyalu). Features a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricately designed jhumkas featuring a stylized peacock (Mayuri) motif. The peacock design is accented with pear-shaped emeralds and delicate ruby details. The dome-shaped jhumka showcases CZ stones set in a classic pave setting, with delicate pearl drops for a traditional touch.
occasions: or any special occasion where a touch of traditional elegance is desired. Perfect for a bride (Vadhu) during Muhurtham.
description: A timeless classic, these Swarna Mayuri Jhumkas showcase the best of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The peacock design symbolizes beauty and grace, while the combination of emeralds, rubies, and gold creates a rich and luxurious look. The high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty, making these jhumkas a cherished heirloom.
